title: Shihaisha no Tasogare (Twilight Of The Dark Master)
synopsis: Since the beginning of time, monstrous Demons and noble Guardians have battled for Earth - the everlasting gift of the one great Mother, creator of all life. A deep hatred burns between Demon and Guardian; the Guardians prevented the Demons from destroying humanity and the world itself.
voices: ['Seki, Toshihiko', 'Yasui, Kunihiko', 'Katou, Seizou', 'Takano, Urara', 'Shinohara, Emi', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Murozono, Takehiro', 'Hashi, Takaya', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Kamiya, Akira']
staff: [['Takahashi, Naoko', ['Producer']], ['Shinbou, Akiyuki', ['Director']], ['Oohashi, Yoshimitsu', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamashita, Takaaki', ['Key Animation']]]
